title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it should not be visible in the PDF preview. However, the label is still visible in the PDF preview.
OB: Label is still visible in the PDF preview even though the display property is set to 'none'.
EB: Label should disappear from the PDF preview when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
1. Open the PDF preview.
2. Set the display property of the label to 'none'.
3. Verify if the label is still visible in the PDF preview.
